Type.label: Type
Type.help: Default value Book - choose Journal for Journals with various articles, Collection for Complete Works or Collections of poems, Dictionaries for Dictionaries.

Title.label: Title
Title.help: Title of the book as it will appear in the main space, with [[double brackets]] to create a direct link.

Author.label: Author (s)
Author.help: The author (s), as they appear in the Author space - example: [[Author: Jules Verne | Jules Verne]].

wikidata_item.label: Identifier of the corresponding Wikidata entity
wikidata_item.help: Identifier of the Wikidata entity describing the edition corresponding to the facsimile. Must be of the form QXXX with XXX a number.

Advancement.label: Advancement
Advancement.help: Progress of the review of the book. For a book that has just been set up, the value to be used is generally to correct

values.X: Incomplete source (extract) or compilation from different sources
values.L: Defective file (gaps, out of order pages, etc.)
values.D: Duplicate, another file exists on which it is better to work

Pages.label: Pages
Pages.help: Serves to match the pagination of the scan with that of the book - indicate <pagelist then for unnumbered pages from the beginning 1toX = then indicate to which page of the scan corresponds the numbered page 1 in the book - eg: 9 = 1/>

Css.label: Css
Css.help: Used to indicate a particular style sheet, for certain types of work.
